plot: A young man searches for spiritual healing. He leaps head over heels into the world of Ashrams, centers and communities of Berlin, where he finds the love of a young and beautiful Yoga teacher.
title: Spirit Berlin
plot_es: A young man searches for spiritual healing. He leaps head over heels into the world of Ashrams, centers and communities of Berlin, where he finds the love of a young and beautiful Yoga teacher.
plot_en: A young man searches for spiritual healing. He leaps head over heels into the world of Ashrams, centers and communities of Berlin, where he finds the love of a young and beautiful Yoga teacher.
